preloadTrial.messageText: Please wait while the experiment loads. This may take a few minutes.

fullScreenTrial.prompt:
The experiment will switch to full screen mode.
Click the button to continue.

stimulusPrompt: Press the Spacebar when you are ready to proceed. Remember to sit at one arm distance from the screen.

gradeSelect.text2: To get started, press the number key on your keyboard of the grade you are in.
gradeSelect.text3: For example, you would press “4” if you are in 4th grade.
gradeSelect.text4: Press the number key of the grade you are in to continue
